entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 07 February 2023
